echo ""=== Framework demo public key ===""
head -5 /Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/demo_anp_open_sdk_framework/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/key-1_public.pem

echo ""=== Demo SDK public key ===""
head -5 /Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/demo_anp_open_sdk/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/key-1_public.pem

echo ""=== Test public key ===""

Bash(# 检查所有DID文档中的JWK公钥
echo ""=== Framework demo JWK ===""
jq ''.verificationMethod[0].publicKeyJwk'' /Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/demo_anp_open_sdk_framework/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/did_document.json

echo ""=== User service JWK ===""
jq ''.verificationMethod[0].publicKeyJwk'' /Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/demo_anp_user_service/anp_user_service/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/did_document.json

echo ""=== Demo SDK JWK ===""
jq ''.verificationMethod[0].publicKeyJwk'' /Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/demo_anp_open_sdk/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/did_document.json

echo ""=== Test JWK ===""
jq ''.verificationMethod[0].publicKeyJwk'' /Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/test/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/did_document.json)

Bash(# 使用Python检查所有DID文档中的JWK公钥
python3 -c ""
import json

files = [
    ''/Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/demo_anp_open_sdk_framework/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/did_document.json'',
    ''/Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/demo_anp_user_service/anp_user_service/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/did_document.json'',
    ''/Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/demo_anp_open_sdk/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/did_document.json'',
    ''/Users/seanzhang/seanwork/anp-open-sdk/test/data_user/localhost_9527/anp_users/user_42cd01f324d61962/did_document.json''
]

names = [''Framework demo'', ''User service'', ''Demo SDK'', ''Test'']

for i, file_path in enumerate(files):
    try:
        with open(file_path, ''r'') as f:
            data = json.load(f)
            jwk = data[''verificationMethod''][0][''publicKeyJwk'']
            print(f''{names[i]} JWK:'')
            print(f''  x: {jwk[\""x\""]}'')
            print(f''  y: {jwk[\""y\""]}'')
            print()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''{names[i]}: Error - {e}'')
        print()
"")
